Date: 2025-04-09 13:55
Subject: Easter Holidays, Welcoming Hamdi Chatti, Goal Setting deadline extended, Spring's Fiesta at Tryano, Weekly internal opportunities
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/4013117e1d4012e259ef7a87dcdce3d8405846238.png> 	

EASTER HOLIDAY

On the occasion of Easter, we are happy to announce that in the UAE, Good Friday, April 18th will be a day off for all Back-office team members and warehouse/distrubution and store consultants will be offered a compensatory day off.

We will be back on Monday the 21st of April.

We wish you a blessed Easter holiday filled with love, health and peace of mind.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	
Welcoming Hamdi Chatti 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=615&user=10620> 	
Hamdi Chatti joins our Group as CEO of Christofle, with over 25 years of 360 experience. Hamdi's career in the luxury sector began at Cartier, as Manager for Timepieces New Product Development and held key positions including Managing Director of Montblanc in Switzerland and Hamburg, where he successfully established the Timepieces and Jewellery universe.

chunks.text:
Timepieces New Product Development and held key positions including Managing Director of Montblanc in Switzerland and Hamburg, where he successfully established the Timepieces and Jewellery universe. He was also the CEO of Timepieces and EVP of Jewellery at Harry Winston in New York. 
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=615&user=10620> 
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-6-min.png> 	

DEADLINE EXTENDED: 5 DAYS TO SET YOUR GOALS

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=616&user=10620> 	

Upload your goals in DRIVE by 15th April. After this date, the system will be locked and you will be unable to add your goals.

Need assistance? Visit the Performance Management page <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=616&user=10620>  for FAQs, guidance and resources to help you set goals in alignment with the Group’s objectives.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Spring’s Fiesta at Tryano


This April, Tryano presents "Spring’s Fiesta," a vibrant celebration of sun-soaked style, bold prints, and effortless glamour. For the first time, Tryano is gearing up for sun-drenched destinations with an exciting curation of Latin American brands. Join us in-store for exciting floral workshops, refreshing coconut drinks, and floral bracelet-making activities, available until May 9. Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=617&user=10620> 


 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=617&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/2712259014df40f0f101ce8370caf7f6976942410.png>
